title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the SupplyChainSentinel project, including the specific supply chain processes to be monitored, the types of IoT sensors and data to be used, the blockchain technology for traceability, and the AI models for predictive analytics. Ensure to involve relevant stakeholders (e.g., supply chain experts, IoT specialists, blockchain developers, data scientists) to gather comprehensive requirements.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture for SupplyChainSentinel, including the components for IoT sensor data ingestion, blockchain integration, AI model training and deployment, and user interfaces.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Set up the development environment, including version control, continuous integration/deployment pipelines, and any necessary cloud infrastructure.

title: Implement IoT Sensor Data Ingestion
description: Develop the components for ingesting and processing data from IoT sensors in the supply chain.

title: Integrate Blockchain for Traceability
description: Implement the integration with a blockchain platform for ensuring traceability and transparency in the supply chain.

title: Develop AI Models for Predictive Analytics
description: Build and train AI models for predictive analytics on supply chain data, such as demand forecasting, risk assessment, and optimization.

title: Design and Implement User Interfaces
description: Design and develop user interfaces for visualizing supply chain data, monitoring alerts, and configuring AI models.

title: Conduct Security Audits
description: Perform security audits on the system components, including the IoT sensor data ingestion, blockchain integration, AI models, and user interfaces.
dependencies: Develop AI Models for Predictive Analytics

title: Implement Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute comprehensive test plans for the SupplyChainSentinel system, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.
dependencies: Develop AI Models for Predictive Analytics

title: Deploy and Monitor System
description: Deploy the SupplyChainSentinel system to a production environment, set up monitoring and logging, and establish processes for ongoing maintenance and updates.

title: Create Documentation and Training Materials
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and training materials for the SupplyChainSentinel system, including user guides, technical documentation, and training materials for stakeholders and end-users.
dependencies: Develop AI Models for Predictive Analytics
